name: Temperature at 2 Meters Minimum
definition: The minimum hourly air (dry bulb) temperature at 2 meters above the surface of the earth in the period of interest.

name: Temperature at 2 Meters Maximum
definition: The maximum hourly air (dry bulb) temperature at 2 meters above the surface of the earth in the period of interest.

name: Relative Humidity at 2 Meters
definition: The ratio of actual partial pressure of water vapor to the partial pressure at saturation, expressed in percent.

name: Precipitation Corrected
definition:
The bias corrected average of total precipitation at the surface of the earth in water mass (includes water content in snow). NOTE: If selecting DayCent Format for Output the precipitation is converted into cm/day.
                                                     If selecting 'Full Data' the precipitation is retained as mm/day
